nodes.bodyText:
I had a look at the code and I do not think moving the method would cause any issues (should be confirmed by STs as well).
I agree that this shows deeper issues. I think the problem is that we do Kafka rolling upgrade on multiple places (C renewals, upgrades, regular RUetc.) and not just in one place. That leads to inconsistencies and errors. But I think it is beyond this PR to fix that. We should probably have some issue for it and look at it in the future.
